name: Brightwood village
description:
Playtime is approximately 15-25mins.
No save-game functionality.

The game was made as a side-project in approximately 48 hours spread out over 2 months. It is my first game. Please enjoy.

TOOLS:
Engine: GB Studio
Art: Aseprite

NOTES:
GB-ROM: I've only tested it in emulators not on an original Gameboy yet. I hope it works. :)

Pocket: I've uploaded a ".pocket" file for those interested, but I have no way of testing it. I hope it works. :)
